titleStmt.title: The love and faithfulnes of the Scottish nation the excellency of the covenant, the vnion between England and Scotland, cleared, by collections, from the [brace] declarations of Parliament, and, speeches of severall Independent brethren. By Theophilos.
titleStmt.author: Theophilos.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F: Neile for Tho: Vnderhill at the signe of the Bible in Woodstreet.,

notesStmt.note: On t.p., "Theophilos" is printed in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in Woodstreet.
